trans-unit.source: With the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace, you can programmatically create grammars that comply with the W3C <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0</see> (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> 네임스페이스의 멤버를 사용하여 W3C SRGS(<see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0</see>)를 준수하는 문법을 프로그래밍 방식으로 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To create an SRGS grammar programmatically, you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements.
trans-unit.target: 빈 SRGS 문법을 프로그래밍 방식으로 만들려면 생성할 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 인스턴스를 SRGS 요소를 나타내는 클래스의 인스턴스를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classes represent elements defined in the SRGS specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> 클래스 SRGS 사양에 정의 된 요소를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class represent attributes in the SRGS specification, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 속성 중 일부는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 클래스와 같은 SRGS 사양에는 특성을 나타내는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [SRGS Grammar XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) for a reference to the elements and attributes of the SRGS specification as supported by System.Speech.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [SRGS 문법 XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) System.Speech에서 지 원하는 대로 SRGS 사양의 특성과 해당 요소에 대 한 참조에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To add a grammar rule to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> class.
trans-unit.target: 문법 규칙을 추가 하려면 한 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> 의 메서드는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the text within an SRGS element using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instance.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 SRGS 요소 내에서 텍스트를 수정할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> 의 속성을 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> class, you can optimize recognition of phrases in a grammar by specifying subsets of a complete phrase that will be allowed to constitute a match, and by selecting a matching mode from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 와 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> 클래스에서 일치 하는 모드를 선택 하 고 할 수 있는 일치 항목을 구성 하는 전체 문구의 하위 집합을 지정 하 여 인식 문법에 구의 최적화할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [문법을 사용 하 여 SrgsGrammar 만들](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) 에 [.NET Framework 4.0에 대 한 시스템 음성 프로그래밍 가이드](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) 자세한 내용 및 예제에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances from existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar files, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 생성할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 의 인스턴스에서 기존 SRGS 호환 XML 문법 파일에서 인스턴스 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, 또는의 인스턴스에서 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> class to prepare completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objects for consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> 완료를 준비 하는 클래스 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 음성 인식 엔진에 의해 소비에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Grammars created with members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace can be used by constructors of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class to create <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 멤버를 사용 하 여 만든 문법은 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> 네임 스페이스의 생성자에서 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> 만들 클래스 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> 개체입니다.
